headline: Morgan Stanley Upgrades L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Buoyed by Golden Dome Opportunities
summary: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) is one of the best aerospace and defense stocks to buy according to Wall Street analysts. On December 16, analysts at Morgan Stanley upgraded L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) to an Overweight from Equalweight and raised the price target to $367 from $350. The upgrade is in response to the investment bank’s touting of […]
